metadata.synopsis: There are piles and individual skeletons in justiciar сuirass scattered across the Town and SCL. We can click some of the most posing of them to get little narrator comment. Shadowheart may have followed up on this if we know about her justiciar connection.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *There is a darkness to these warriors that endures even now, long after their lives were spent. But who did they serve?*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Dark Justiciars, who fell long ago in service of Shar, and Ketheric Thorm.*
